name: V - Top Left
_source: speak;Woman1; This is terrible{tgm}...{tgm}{w} What are we going to do? Those bandits are so close.{w} If we can't find some way to protect ourselves, our village is doomed.
speak;Emma; People, listen to me!{w} Get inside your homes and close the doors, quickly!{w} We'll hold the bandits off as long as we can.
speak;Woman1; Oh, thank you!{w} Please, be careful!
speak;Emma; There's a house left with its door open...{w} I should check if anyone is inside.;no_talk
speak;Selena; Emma, is that you?{w} {tgm}...{tgm}It is!
speak;Emma; I'm sorry, but I don't know who you are?{w} But, if you know my name{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Did we meet when I was young?
speak;Selena; Yes, I visited Mendhaven once, many a moon ago.{w} You were still 7 years old, last that I saw you.{w} Now look at you, you're practically an adult!
speak;Emma; When I was 7?{w} Wait{tgm}...{tgm}are you Selena by any chance?

speak;Selena; I'm{tgm}...{tgm}impressed you remembered.{w} Smart kid, though I'm not surprised.{w} I was there to help deal with a monster in one of your village caves.{w} How is Mendhaven, by the way?{w} I haven't been back in some time.
speak;Emma; It was destroyed by demons.
speak;Emma; The town{tgm}...{tgm}we've laid everyone to rest.
speak;Selena; What?{w} But, with Caroline and everyone there{tgm}...
speak;Emma; The demons were able to reanimate the dead.{w} The{tgm}...{tgm}eye demons could attach to corpses.{w} The village fell victim to their numbers.
speak;Selena; I'm{tgm}...{tgm}I'm sorry to hear that.

speak;Selena; I{tgm}...{tgm}can see the fear lingers in your eyes.{w} I wish I could have been there to help,{w} but it looks like my timing was poor,{w} both then and now. I'm out of time.{w} Please, stay safe, and tell Emily that I said 'Hey' for me.
speak;Emma; You seem strong.{w} How do you{tgm}...{tgm} How do you fight through the fear?{w} How can I get through this?
speak;Selena; A hug does wonders for such things.

speak;Selena; There's no need to act tough.{w} I'm sure if you talk to Caroline{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Beyond that, a word of advice.{w} You cannot let yourself descend into sorrow from this.{w} Once you reach the lowest point of despair,{w} you'll find it nigh impossible to climb back up.{w} Take this, and I'm sorry there isn't more that I can do for you.{w} I promise that we will meet again.
speak;Emma; Thanks, and{tgm}...{tgm}I hope we'll meet again as well.

speak;Selena; And who are you? You don't look like one of the local peasantry.{w} As you can see, these villagers have some bandit troubles.{w} I would like to help, but I have orders to follow{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I am required to quit this area at once.{w} I would ask you to aid them in this fight.{w} I will pay you for this trouble, of course.
